tech.name: Gardening
tech.description: You're eventually going to run out of berries to eat right? Just plant some bushes out back!

tech.name: Improved Cultivation
tech.flavorText: The power of the Hoe compells thee!
tech.description: Your skills with gardening have increased! Your plants grow with twice the vigor and your able to keep more plants under control!

tech.name: Weaving
tech.flavorText: Interlacing the strings of time. Sort of.
tech.description: Your people's clothing is starting to rot away, leaving them exposed to the elements. No more! For with your new weavers they won't go cold! So long as you have the resources that is...
